subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Project Steering Committee (SC) responsible for overseeing project implementation - comprising of key ministries, EU, development partners and UNDP - endorsed the 2010 work plan (annex 1) and agreed on a second project no-cost extension to utilize the remaining funds and continue implementing Objective 2 of the work plan and finish the remaining activities of Objective 1.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Capacity Development for Aid M
